entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
